data.title: Texas Tech University
data.text:
Undergraduate

Explore your passions while building a strong foundation for your future. Choose from over 150 degree programs and kickoff your career at Texas Tech. From here, it’s possible™.

Find Your Way

International

Our diverse campus and comprehensive academic and research offerings provide the educational experience you need in an environment where you will thrive.

Start Your Journey

Graduate

As one of 94 Carnegie Very High Research Activity public universities, Texas Tech offers the programs, facilities, and support that graduate students need to excel. From here, it’s possible™.

Continue Your Path

School of Law

As the Best Value Law School in Texas (National Jurist, Fall 2019), Texas Tech Law takes a student-first approach with a focus on real-world practical skills.

Make Your Ruling

School of Veterinary Medicine

The newest School of Veterinary Medicine in the state, and the first in Texas in over 100 years, provides classroom and community-based learning to educate the next generation of veterinarians.

Take the Reins

Majors & Colleges

Our thirteen colleges and schools host hundreds of degree programs, research opportunities, and practical learning experiences to prepare you for your future.

Explore Your Options

Office of Research & Innovation

Our thirteen colleges and schools host hundreds of degree programs, research opportunities, and practical learning experiences to prepare you for your future.

Discover The Unexpected

Texas Tech Now - Research

Revolutionary research is conducted at Texas Tech, a Carnegie Tier One Research Institution. Don’t take our word for it. Here’s the proof.

Investigate The Ingenuity

Innovation Hub

From ideas to impact, The Hub assists in the formation of new business solutions to create social and commercial value.

Ignite a Spark

Develop & Submit Proposal

If additional support from outside sources is necessary to fulfill your needs, you can find a step-by-step process on how to write engaging proposals and secure more funding here.

Prepare Your Proposal

Entrepreneurial Programs

Craving some competition or needing opportunities for growth? The Innovation Hub offers several programs that can satisfy your needs.

Participate In A Program

Discoveries

Catch up on the latest research happening at Texas Tech. From cotton to glassblowing, black holes and startups, exciting work is happening here.

Discover Research

Map

1,800 acres is a lot of campus, from residence halls and academic buildings to bus stops and dining options, find your way around Texas Tech.

Navigate Your Journey

University Student Housing

Where you choose to call your home away from home is an important decision. See all the options Texas Tech has to offer.

Reveal Your Residence

Dining on Campus

From delivery to takeout, it’s never been easier to dine on campus. With a plethora of food choices, mobile ordering and contactless payment options, you’ll have no problem feeding your inner Red Raider.

Eat With Ease

Raider Safety

Ensuring a safe environment is Texas Tech's top priority. When an emergency arises, there's help.

Health, safety, and well-being

University Recreation

Go for a leisurely swim, climb a wall, or compete with friends through Texas Tech’s University Recreation. However you choose to move, we’ve got you covered.

Flex Your Fitness

Student Engagement

Build relationships that last a lifetime. Texas Tech is home to more than 450 student organizations and clubs, many competing with peers around the country.

Engage In The Excitement

Student Resources

Need career advice, a mentor, financial guidance, or a book to read? Student Resources has your back.

Reveal Your Resources

Athletics

Raider Power resides here. On or off the field, Texas Tech’s athletic teams represent the university with pride. From football to baseball, volleyball, and track and field, we have our bases covered.

Support Our Teams

Shop Official TTU Gear

Can’t hide that Red Raider pride? Find everything you need to show your support of Texas Tech here. From hats, T-shirts, sweaters and more, shop the official store.

Grab Your Gear

Ticketing

Cheer on the Red Raiders as we compete across 17 varsity sports in the Big 12 Conference. Our new mobile ticketing makes it easy to get the best seats in town.

Secure Your Spot

Red Raider Club

Support for student-athletes is found here. From educational and nutritional needs to training facilities and leadership development, funds from the Red Raider Club help our student-athletes succeed.

Support Student-Athletes

Texas Tech Facts

More than 40,000 students, 220,000 alumni and 1,800 acres of campus beauty. Test your Red Raider trivia knowledge right here.

Check The Facts

Our Campus

Discover what makes Texas Tech stand out from the crowd. From our traditions to housing, dining, and health, get all the details.

Explore Texas Tech

Office of the Provost

Here is where you’ll discover the academic mission of Texas Tech as well as find resources for students and faculty.

Learn More

History & Traditions

Our rich, vibrant history extends back to 1923. Don’t know about Guns Up, Soapsuds or Carol of Lights®? Look no further.

Research Our Roots

University Strategic Plan

What we do in the present is predicated on what we want for the future. Texas Tech is pursuing a foundation for its next century of successes. Our current Strategic Plan provides a pathway to 2025.

Focus on the Future

Academic Catalog

Looking to find degree plans, available classes or other resources offered at Texas Tech? Our academic catalog has everything you need in one place.

Discover Your Options

Academic Calendar

Need to know when classes start, spring break happens, or when its finals week? Our up-to-date academic calendar can help you better plan your semester.

Save The Dates

Career Opportunities

Work somewhere that values you and treats you like family. At Texas Tech, you’ll be embraced like family and empowered to advance your career.

Peruse Open Positions

Administration

It takes a village to raise a university. Behind Texas Tech stands leaders who carry out the roles and responsibilities necessary to keep it running.

A Look At Leadership

Organizational Chart

Know the flow of Texas Tech from the top, down.

Check The Chart

Campus Art Trail

More than 100 original works of art grace the Texas Tech System campuses. Take a tour to experience all the beauty planted in Texas Tech’s backyard.

Experience the Artwork

Red Raider Athletics

Raider Power resides here. On or off the field, Texas Tech’s athletic teams represent the university with pride.

Support Our Teams
